channel.title: NPR Topics: National
channel.description: NPR coverage of national news, U.S. politics, elections, business, arts, culture, health and science, and technology. Subscribe to the NPR Nation RSS feed.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: U.S. launches strikes in Syria targeting Islamic State fighters after American deaths
item.description: The Trump administration launched military strikes in Syria to "eliminate" Islamic State group fighters in retaliation for an attack that killed two U.S. troops and an American interpreter a week ago.
item.content:encoded:
The Trump administration launched military strikes in Syria to "eliminate" Islamic State group fighters in retaliation for an attack that killed two U.S. troops and an American interpreter a week ago.

(Image credit: Julia Demaree Nikhinson)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Detained migrant children aren't being reunited with family, government sources say
item.description: Employees in the government agency that deals with unaccompanied minors who crossed the U.S.-Mexico border say an order has been given not to release those children to their relatives here in the U.S.
item.content:encoded: Employees in the government agency that deals with unaccompanied minors who crossed the U.S.-Mexico border say an order has been given not to release those children to their relatives here in the U.S.
item.dc:creator: Mark Betancourt

item.title: Justice Department begins releasing Epstein files... What's next?
item.description: The Justice Department has begun releasing some the Epstein files. NPR's Mary Louise Kelly talks with Congressman Ro Khanna, D-Calif., who co-sponsored the legislation.
item.content:encoded: The Justice Department has begun releasing some the Epstein files. NPR's Mary Louise Kelly talks with Congressman Ro Khanna, D-Calif., who co-sponsored the legislation.
item.dc:creator: Alejandra Marquez Janse

item.title: Trump's push to end transgender care for young people opposed by pediatricians
item.description: Doctors and children's hospitals say nothing in the evidence has changed to justify the Trump administration's efforts to ban gender-affirming care for teens and tweens.
item.content:encoded:
Doctors and children's hospitals say nothing in the evidence has changed to justify the Trump administration's efforts to ban gender-affirming care for teens and tweens.

(Image credit: Selena Simmons-Duffin)
item.dc:creator: Selena Simmons-Duffin

item.title: VA will cut 25,000 positions it has been unable to fill
item.description: The VA secretary says the department will trim at least 25,000 vacant positions from the rolls. That's after about that same number have already left the VA this year.
item.content:encoded: The VA secretary says the department will trim at least 25,000 vacant positions from the rolls. That's after about that same number have already left the VA this year.
item.dc:creator: Quil Lawrence

item.title: How two murder investigations came together in New England last night
item.description: Two major murder cases in New England converged with news that the suspect in both cases is dead. Police at first did not realize that the same gunman was behind both shootings.
item.content:encoded: Two major murder cases in New England converged with news that the suspect in both cases is dead. Police at first did not realize that the same gunman was behind both shootings.
item.dc:creator: David Wright

item.title: DOJ releases Epstein files and the first batch is short on new information
item.description: The Justice Department released some of the Epstein files, including many previously public documents, related to convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein's criminal charges and his death by suicide in federal custody.
item.content:encoded:
The Justice Department released some of the Epstein files, including many previously public documents, related to convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein's criminal charges and his death by suicide in federal custody.

(Image credit: Joe Schildhorn/Patrick McMullan)
item.dc:creator: Stephen Fowler

item.title: Judge blocks HUD homelessness overhaul, rebukes agency for causing 'chaos'
item.description: A federal judge said HUD cannot dramatically change its funding policies on homelessness for now. States, cities and nonprofits say the proposed overhaul would push thousands back onto the streets.
item.content:encoded:
A federal judge said HUD cannot dramatically change its funding policies on homelessness for now. States, cities and nonprofits say the proposed overhaul would push thousands back onto the streets.

(Image credit: Kent Nishimura)
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Ludden

item.title: A Reddit post helped find MIT and Brown shooting suspect. Here's what we know
item.description: Details are beginning to emerge about the life of Claudio Manuel Neves Valente, the gunman who killed two and injured nine others in the attack at Brown University last week. He is also believed to have killed an MIT professor on Monday, police said.
item.content:encoded:
Details are beginning to emerge about the life of Claudio Manuel Neves Valente, the gunman who killed two and injured nine others in the attack at Brown University last week. He is also believed to have killed an MIT professor on Monday, police said.

(Image credit: Robert F. Bukaty)
item.dc:creator: Jaclyn Diaz

item.title: Cheddar bay biscuits, cheap margs and memories: Readers share their nostalgia for chain restaurants
item.description: Americans have deep nostalgia, and love, for America's chain restaurants. Why? We asked and more than 150 readers answered.
item.content:encoded: Americans have deep nostalgia, and love, for America's chain restaurants. Why? We asked and more than 150 readers answered.
item.dc:creator: Jaclyn Diaz
